html:
Nov 24 (Reuters) - Dee Tech DEE_p.PA:

  • ANNOUNCES PLANS TO JOIN FORCES WITH THE COMPANY COLIS PRIVE GROUP TO CREATE A EUROPEAN LEADER IN THE FIELD OF E-COMMERCE DELIVERIES

  • ALLIANCE WITH COLIS PRIVE GROUP WILL BE LISTED ON PARIS STOCK MARKET

  • DEE TECH IS A SPAC SPECIAL PURPOSE ACQUISITION VEHICLE, WHOSE FOUNDERS INCLUDE MARC MENASÉ, MICHAËL BENABOU, CHARLES HUBERT DE CHAUDENAY, AND ROGER CANIARD

  • COLIS PRIVE HAD SALES OF 233.8 MILLION EUROS IN 2020

  • DEUTSCHE BANK ADVISING DEE TECH ON THIS DEAL, ROTHSCHILD ADVISING COLIS PRIVE

  • NEW COMPANY'S BOARD WILL INCLUDE EX AMAZON LOGISTICS EUROPE AMZN.O EXECUTIVE PHILIPPE HENARD AND EX ILIAD ILD.PA EXECUTIVE ANGELIQUE GERARD

Source text for Eikon: [ID:]

Further company coverage: DEE_p.PA


(Paris Newsroom)
